title: "NO SAUSAGE?!?" GRAVY FOR BISCUITS AND GRAVY
directions: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Sprinkle flour over melted butter and whisk together to form a paste. Allow this to cook for a minute.
Pour in milk, all at once, whisking constantly.
Add seasonings, whisking constantly. Allow the gravy to come to a boil, still whisking. Taste and adjust seasoning, if necessary.
